What to do for Urinary Incontinence in Children ?,"Eating, diet, and nutrition have not been shown to play a role in causing or preventing UI in children, though ensuring sufficient fluid intake throughout the day and avoiding caffeine intake may be helpful.",NIDDK,Urinary Incontinence in Children
